title: Get in Touch
description: Have questions about WITS 2026? Our team is here to help you with any inquiries

venue.name: Fez National School of Applied Sciences
venue.address: Avenue My Abdallah Km 5. Route d'Imouzzer, Fès BP 72.

faq.question: How do I submit a paper?
faq.answer: Please visit our Call for Papers page for detailed submission guidelines and deadlines. The submission system will be available soon.

faq.question: What is the dress code for the conference?
faq.answer: Business casual attire is recommended for all conference sessions. The conference dinner may require more formal attire.

faq.question: Are there student discounts available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer significant discounts for students. Please see our registration page for current pricing and requirements.

faq.question: Will the sessions be recorded?
faq.answer: Selected keynote presentations will be recorded and made available to registered participants after the conference.
